content:
Why is QuantityClientParam deprecated?
https://github.com/hapifhir/hapi-fhir/blob/master/hapi-fhir-base/src/main/java/ca/uhn/fhir/rest/gclient/QuantityClientParam.java I can see that was done in https://github.com/hapifhir/hapi-fhir/commit/c1141eb18f4dea39df934aebbb52f5c9898a4601 but can't work out why?
